item.title: The Cost of Lost Parking Time More Than Just Inconvenience
item.description: We’ve all been there. You’re late for a meeting, or eager to get home after a long day, but first, you have to find your car in that sprawling parking lot. You circle around, frustration mounting, precious minutes ticking away. This isn’t just a minor annoyance; the time wasted searching for parking has a real cost â€“ in terms of time, money, and even your well-being. The Time Drain Think about how much time you spend searching for parking in a typical week.
